column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////In town for a graduation
column2: Bosscat's was suggested by a friend.  From walk-up to walk out
column3: everything was on point.  The music selection played throughout kept us all grooving.  Hands down one of my top runners on shrimp and grits.  I cleaned my plate.  Folks
column4: if your looking for a place that gives an upscale but relaxed environment
column5: Bosskat's Kitchen is the place.  I only wish we had one in Dallas
column6: TX but I will be back.  Good food
